<#include "../support/bean.html"> <@page_overview_title/> <@groovy> def ouputstring="" logger="${getStringParameter("logger")}" if(logger.equals("ROOT")){ logger=org.apache.log4j.LogManager.getRootLogger() }else{ logger=org.apache.log4j.LogManager.getLogger(logger) } logger.setLevel(org.apache.log4j.Level.toLevel("${getStringParameter("level")}")) return ouputstring

Logger ${getStringParameter("logger")} level changed to ${getStringParameter("level")}.
